tool.name: HapMap:

param.name: name
param.label: Output name
param.help: New workspace Hapmap format genotype dump name

tool.help:
**Syntax**
- **Output name** is the name to use for the genotype output file - **HapMap panel** is the population from which genotypes should be extracted - **Chromosome** is the chromosome to use - **Start of region** marks the offset to start the extract - **End of region** marks the offset to end the extract - **Build** is the HapMap build to select
-----
**Summary**
This tool imports genotype data from the International Hapmap project data by chromosomal region into Galaxy.
Originally designed and written for the Rgenetics project by ross lazarus (ross.lazarus@gmail.com)
